notes.note:
Not sure what giphy integration meant here, but being able to paste a giphy link and make it use the "mp4" version would be awesome. Same for some other "oembed" enable content we could whitelist, lik

* slideshare
* speakerdeck
* youtube
* vimeo

etc.
notes.note_html:
Not sure what giphy integration meant here, but being able to paste a giphy link and make it use the "mp4" version would be awesome. Same for some other "oembed" enable content we could whitelist, lik

  • slideshare
  • speakerdeck
  • youtube
  • vimeo

etc.

notes.note:
My proposal: --- **MVP:** - Add a `/giphy ` slash command - Expand the slash command to a `![search term](url.gif)` image tag (back end)
Preview
--- **Enhancement (shuffle):** - Add "shuffle" and "select" buttons to the preview (front end) - The shuffle button initiates an API request to get a new gif URL - The select button replaces the slash command with the image tag in the markdown
Preview
notes.note_html:
My proposal:

MVP:

  • Add a /giphy <search term> slash command
  • Expand the slash command to a ![search term](url.gif) image tag (back end)
Preview

Enhancement (shuffle):

  • Add "shuffle" and "select" buttons to the preview (front end)
  • The shuffle button initiates an API request to get a new gif URL
  • The select button replaces the slash command with the image tag in the markdown
Preview
